entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
